mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTES_TITLE AS notesTitle,N.MEETING_ID AS meetingId,N.ATTACH AS attach,M.SUBJECT AS subject, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=M.CHAIR) AS chairName, N.REMARK AS remark,N.ATTACH_PRIV AS attachPriv, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=N.CREATE_USER) AS createUserName, (SELECT R.NAME FROM MEETING_ROOM R WHERE R.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND R.ROOM_ID=M.ROOM_ID) AS roomName FROM MEETING_NOTES N LEFT JOIN MEETING M ON M.ORG_ID=N.ORG_ID AND M.MEETING_ID = N.MEETING_ID WHERE N.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND N.NOTES_ID=#{notesId}
